name: prowlarr
tagline: A unified indexer manager for Usenet and torrent sources
description: Prowlarr is a self-hosted indexer manager for Usenet and torrent indexers. It integrates with Radarr, Sonarr, and Lidarr for managing indexer sources and fetching metadata via a unified UI.

features.title: Indexer Management
features.description: Centrally manage Usenet and torrent indexers for all your *arr applications

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Synchronize indexer configurations across Radarr, Sonarr, Lidarr, and Readarr automatically

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search across all configured indexers simultaneously from a unified interface

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor indexer performance, success rates, and response times

features.title: Custom Filters
features.description: Create filters to exclude unwanted results based on size, quality, or other criteria

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Route indexer traffic through proxies or VPNs for privacy and access
